author: A_Brickset_user
title: It rocks! Twin turbo bike....
review:
This bike is excellent! Its big too. It has realistic suspension on both wheels, V2 engine chain driven with rear wheels - as in real motor cycle. There are few other goodies, like instrument panel, front & rear lights including indicators and number plate. It even has a parking stand. However, the joint between front & rear part could have been stronger and turning radius should be tighter.

Anyway, this is a great model and best among Lego motorcycles and fun to play with.
The alternate model, a dragstar, is useless though IMHO.
